overview:
Virl Hill is the President and Chief Executive Officer of Blade Games World, the parent company of consumer game creation destination Jumala.

Mr. Hill created and managed strategic partnerships with major media companies, sports leagues, cable networks, leading digital media companies and cable MSOs at Rhapsody, Rollingstone.com and RealNetworks. While at RealNetworks, he helped create many pioneering licensing and distribution relationships and economic models around early stage digital media, including a/v search, premium subscription content, digital music and ad supported streaming video. Prior to his tenure at RealNetworks, he headed the strategic planning team for The Walt Disney Company’s Television and Non-Feature Animation production divisions. He also previously worked in international distribution at Hanna-Barbera Productions and in investment banking with Credit Suisse First Boston.

Mr. Hill is a member of the Academy of Television Arts and Sciences and The Recording Academy. He holds an MBA from Northwestern University’s Kellogg School of Management and BA in economics from Northwestern.
